definition: (used as intensives) extremely, (of a disease) having a rapid course and violent effect
details:
adverb
- (used as intensives) extremely
= synonyms: madly
- as if dead
= synonyms: lifelessly
adjective
- (of a disease) having a rapid course and violent effect
- causing or capable of causing death
= synonyms: deathly, mortal
- of an instrument of certain death
= example: of an instrument of certain death
= synonyms: lethal
- exceedingly harmful
= synonyms: baneful, pernicious, pestilent
- involving loss of divine grace or spiritual death
= example: involving loss of divine grace or spiritual death
= synonyms: mortal
- extremely poisonous or injurious
= synonyms: venomous
